terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.s1content:
These terms and conditions (hereinafter "Terms") apply to purchases made in the online store brightsign.cz operated by Make more s.r.o., Company ID: 21890161, VAT ID: CZ21890161 (hereinafter "Seller").

These Terms govern the mutual rights and obligations between the Seller and the buyer (hereinafter "Customer") arising from the purchase agreement concluded through the online store.
terms.s2content:
The Customer places orders through the online store by completing the order form. An order constitutes a proposal to conclude a purchase agreement.

The purchase agreement is concluded upon confirmation of the order by the Seller, sent to the Customer's email address.

The Seller reserves the right to reject an order, particularly in the case of product unavailability or an obvious pricing error.
terms.s3content:
All prices are displayed both including and excluding VAT. The binding price is the one at the time the order is submitted.

Payment methods:
- Online card payment (Stripe)
- Bank transfer
- Invoice payment (approved B2B customers only)

For bank transfers, goods are shipped after the payment is credited to the Seller's account.
terms.s4content:
In-stock items are typically dispatched within 1–3 business days of order confirmation. Items on order are delivered within the timeframe specified on the product page, usually 3–5 business days.

Shipping is provided through Packeta and other carriers as available.
terms.s5content:
Consumers have the right to withdraw from the purchase agreement without giving a reason within 14 days of receiving the goods. Withdrawal must be communicated in writing to the Seller (by email to info@brightsign.cz).

Goods must be returned undamaged, in original packaging, with all components and documents. The Seller will refund the purchase price within 14 days of receiving the returned goods.

The right of withdrawal does not apply to B2B orders (purchases under a business ID).
terms.s6content:
All goods come with a statutory warranty period of 24 months for consumers. For B2B customers, the warranty period is 12 months.

Complaints should be submitted without undue delay by email to info@brightsign.cz. Details are governed by the Complaints Procedure.
terms.s7content: The processing of personal data is governed by the Privacy Policy, available on the Privacy Policy page.
terms.s8content: These Terms are governed by the laws of the Czech Republic. The Seller reserves the right to amend these Terms unilaterally. Changes take effect on the date of publication on the website.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.metaDescription: Answers to the most common questions about BrightSign players, orders, shipping, and our B2B program.

q1.question: What is BrightSign and what is it used for?
q1.answer: BrightSign is the world leader in digital signage players. The players are used for displaying digital content on screens — in retail stores, restaurants, hotels, offices, hospitals, and other public spaces.

q2.question: What is the difference between the S4, S5 and S6 series?
q2.answer: Series 4 (S4) is the older generation available on clearance at reduced prices. Series 5 (S5) offers higher performance and modern features. Series 6 (S6) is the latest generation with NPU for AI features, 4K60p decoding, and best-in-class performance.

q3.question: How fast do you deliver?
q3.answer: In-stock items ship within 1–2 business days. Delivery within the Czech Republic takes 1–2 days. Slovakia and Poland 2–4 days. Other EU countries 3–5 business days.

q4.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q4.answer: We accept card payments (Visa, Mastercard) via the secure Stripe payment gateway and bank transfer. For B2B customers, we also offer payment on invoice.

q5.question: Do you offer B2B discounts?
q5.answer: Yes! After registering for our B2B program and verifying your VAT ID via VIES, you receive an automatic 10% discount off retail prices. For larger volumes or partner collaboration, we offer individual terms.

q6.question: What is the warranty on BrightSign players?
q6.answer: BrightSign players come with standard manufacturer warranty. Series 5 and 6 have a 5-year warranty from the date of purchase (effective January 1, 2025). Clearance Series 4 products have a 2-year warranty.

q7.question: Do I need a license for a BrightSign player?
q7.answer: No! Unlike competing solutions, BrightSign requires no monthly licensing fees. The BrightAuthor:connected content management software is completely free.

q8.question: How do returns and complaints work?
q8.answer: You can return goods within 14 days of delivery without giving a reason. In case of a defect, file a complaint through our contact form. Details can be found in our returns policy.
